General.Name: TGC Ventures International Inc
General.Description: TGC Ventures International, Inc. operates early detection cancer clinics, using infra-red thermal imaging technology. The technology is used as diagnosis to determine structure changes in tissues to detect breast cancer. The company was formerly known as National Detection Clinics, Ltd. and changed its name to TGC Ventures International, Inc. in December 2005. TGC Ventures International, Inc. was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia.
General.Address: 1170 Peachtree Street NE, Atlanta, GA, United States, 30309
